Class RowsView

java.lang.Object
main.AbstractView
main.RowsView
public class RowsView extends AbstractView
RowsView is a view for displaying and interacting with rows in a specific table managed by the TablrManager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RowsView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList, UUID tableId)
    Constructs a RowsView instance for managing the view of rows in a specific table.

  • Constructor Details

    • RowsView

      public RowsView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList, UUID tableId)
      Constructs a RowsView instance for managing the view of rows in a specific table.
      Parameters:
      mgr - the TablrManager instance responsible for managing views and data models
      tableId - the name of the table whose rows are to be displayed and managed

  • Method Details

    • handleDoubleClick

      public void handleDoubleClick(int x, int y)
      Handles the double-click event. adds a new row if below the list of rows.
      Specified by:
      handleDoubleClick in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the double-click position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the double-click position. Determines the row index.

    • handleSingleClick

      public void handleSingleClick(int x, int y)
      Handles a single-click event in the view. if click lands on a cell of a row, the contents of the cell will be changed. If the cell is a boolean value is toggled, else a new EditRowView is opened to handle the entry of a new value.

      it the click lands left of the leftMargin, the column is selected.

      Specified by:
      handleSingleClick in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the click position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the click position. Determines the row index.

    • handleEscape

      public void handleEscape()
      Handles the escape key press event in the RowsView. This method transitions the view from the current RowsView instance to a new TablesView instance.
      Specified by:
      handleEscape in class AbstractView

    • handleBackSpace

      public void handleBackSpace()
      Handles the backspace key press event in the RowsView. does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleBackSpace in class AbstractView

    • handleCtrlEnter

      public void handleCtrlEnter()
      Handles the Ctrl+Enter key press event in the RowsView. This method switches the current view to a new DesignView.
      Specified by:
      handleCtrlEnter in class AbstractView

    • handleEnter

      public void handleEnter()
      Handles the Enter key press event in the RowsView. does nothing.
      Specified by:
